name: DreamFactory
description: Code Automation for Generating APIs - DreamFactory is an API generation solution that automatically generates secure and documented APIs for databases

scripts.postdeploy: if [ -n "$DATABASE_URL" ]; then eval $(echo $DATABASE_URL | sed 's/postgres:\/\/\([^:]*\):\([^@]*\)@\([^:]*\):\([0-9]*\)\/\(.*\)/export DB_USERNAME=\1 DB_PASSWORD=\2 DB_HOST=\3 DB_PORT=\4 DB_DATABASE=\5/'); echo "Database config parsed from DATABASE_URL"; fi && php artisan config:clear && php artisan migrate --force

APP_DEBUG.description: Enable Laravel debug mode for development

DB_DATABASE.description: Database name (will be automatically set from PostgreSQL addon)

DB_HOST.description: Database host (will be automatically set from PostgreSQL addon)

DB_PASSWORD.description: Database password (will be automatically set from PostgreSQL addon)

DB_USERNAME.description: Database username (will be automatically set from PostgreSQL addon)
